title: Need Tier 3-4 ADC Player - we went 3-0 last night. ADD: nonsencegunna
body:
Our precious ADC will not be participating in Clash tonight, so I am seeking a replacement ADC which is in the Tier 3-4 bracket and their account is ready to go i.e. SMS verified and have a ticket present or the means to do so ^_^

we use DIscord and are chill add IGN: nonsencegunna

replies.body: Hey, Sharkfang625, G4 adc main if u need someone
Hey my IGN is The Argonäut. currently S3 in ranks. can join your team if you like
